de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.interpreter
Class AKOExpressionInterpreter

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.interpreter.ExpressionInterpreterImpl<AKOExpression>
      de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.interpreter.AKOExpressionInterpreter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpressionInterpreter<AKOExpression>
public class AKOExpressionInterpreter
extends ExpressionInterpreterImpl<AKOExpression>

Special interpreter class to interpret AKO-expressions.

The grammar production rule of the expression is:

simple-content-1 ako simple-content-2 ==> tm:subclass-of ( tm:subclass : simple-content-1 , tm:superclass : simple-content-2 )

Author:
Sven Krosse
